name: Broken Dolls
description:
Hello

The dolls are broken again...and that is just scratchung the surface! You have to fix them up during the show.and keep things running.

Controls: Click/Touch to move around, hit the glitching doll to fix it. Avoid the ones that seem to be ok or else it will cost you dearly!

Do this well and you won't get fired from the tour, it's not child's play my dear boy, the dancing dolls business is very professional!
